bill.summary: 9/23/1994--Introduced. Major League Play Ball Act - Subjects the dispute between the major league baseball owners and players to binding arbitration. Establishes an arbitration board to resolve all issues between the parties and render a binding decision to replace their agreement which expired on December 31, 1993.
